name: Glow Streaks
description:
Glow Streaks– “Can you beat the GLOW?”

Tap the streaking glowing lights before they disappear from the screen. The brighter the
color the faster it moves across the screen. Test your eye to hand coordination with Glow
Streaks. How many points can you get before time runs out? Do you have what it takes to
beat your friends? CAN YOU BEAT THE GLOW?

Each glow has a different point value. Each round is timed accordingly. Are you fast and
skilled enough to BEAT THE GLOW?
